newFeatures.name: Code Completion for HTML Attributes
newFeatures.description: Basic code hinting for HTML attribute names. Appears when you type Space within a tag (or press Ctrl+Space).

newFeatures.name: CEF3 Shell Enhancements
newFeatures.description: Add support for Live Development and fix a bunch of bugs. All unit tests now pass in the CEF3 shell.

newFeatures.name: Other Enhancements
newFeatures.description: Add Move Line(s) Up/Down command. Add Save All command.

newFeatures.name: Code Completion for HTML Tags
newFeatures.description: Basic code hinting for HTML tag names. Appears when you type "<" or Ctrl+Space.

newFeatures.name: CEF3 Shell Enhancements
newFeatures.description: Fix bugs and get most unit tests passing in the experimental new shell, based on Chromium Embedding Framework 3 (Brackets currently uses CEF 1).

newFeatures.name: JavaScript Quick Edit
newFeatures.description: Hitting Cmd/Ctrl-E on a function name opens all function definitions with that name in an inline editor.

newFeatures.name: HTML Context Menus
newFeatures.description: This extends the previous menu API to support context menus.

newFeatures.name: Extension Stylesheets
newFeatures.description: Extensions may now use the ExtensionUtils.loadStyleSheet() API to load a custom stylesheet for extension UI.
